attributes.action: Prevent The Further Presciption Of Stimulant Drugs For Children Said To Have ADHD/ADD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Alot of drugs prescirbed for ADHD is harmful and have been suggested to cause life destoying side effects. ADHD has not been proven to be a disease or s physical disorder of the mind. ADHD drugs are said to have the same effect on the brains of people with attension problems as those who do not.
Ritalin in particular is said to be more addictive than Cocaine by the DEA and there is evidence it is more harmful to Human brains.
If there is nothing wrong in the brain with kids with ADHD, then the drugs must cause damage.
The data on the invention of ADHD and the first-line treatment with stimulants is surrounded by controversy and with little or no evidence for the safety of these drugs. Some are inclined to believe ADHD is a fraudulent diagnosis used t sel these harmful drugs...
